ingredients.ingredient: 20 fresh oysters in shells, rinsed and scrubbed clean
2 teaspoons Mexican-style hot sauce (such as Valentina®)

cookingTips: Scrub oyster shells thoroughly under running water before cooking
Cook oysters for exactly 5 minutes under high pressure to avoid overcooking
Serve immediately with spicy butter for best flavor and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Oysters require precision cooking. Are you confident about the timing and temperature needed to cook them perfectly?
